page.title: 05A TYPICAL DAY IN SCHOOL
page.content: The playground is full of running,shouting,laughing and sometimes crying children,all playing different games at the same time.Often the girls make a nuisance of themselves by coming into our yard and trying to join in with cricket or football instead of sticking to netball or skipping.Into school again and soon we are rushing to get a good place in the dinner queue.We have to cross the main road to get to the canteen and we all say "Hello" to Mr Lewis, the lolly-pop man.In the canteen,you mostly hear things like"Oh no,not mushy peas again.I think I'll change to 70p dinners."Soon we're back in the playground again.In the afternoons we have a great variety of lessons like art,P.E.,television,science and drama.At ten to four it's home for tea
